entries.name: prerelease
entries.desc: Allows you to force this dependency to be a prerelease.

entries.name: new(name, *requirements)
entries.desc: Constructs a dependency with name and requirements. The last argument can optionally be the dependency type, which defaults to :runtime.

entries.name: =~(other)
entries.desc: Uses this dependency as a pattern to compare to other. This dependency will match if the name matches the other's name, and other has only an equal version requirement that satisfies this dependency.

entries.name: latest_version?()
entries.desc: Is this dependency simply asking for the latest version of a gem?

entries.name: match? name          => true or falseclick to toggle source
merge(other)
entries.desc: Merges the requirements of other into this dependency

entries.name: prerelease?()
entries.desc: Does this dependency require a prerelease?

entries.name: specific?()
entries.desc: True if the dependency will not always match the latest version.
